title: Exchange of Messages With King Vittorio Emmanuele on the Italian Reception of Two American Aviators.
text:
I WISH to thank Your Majesty for your gracious telegram, as well as for the cordial reception which the American aviators, Messrs. Williams and Yancey, have received from the people of Italy.

HERBERT HOOVER
garbage_collected: [His Majesty Vittorio Emmanuele Third, King of Italy, Rome]
